translation.app.general.title: Warframe Market
translation.app.general.description: Warframe Market에서는 부품, 모드, 청사진, 성유물, 그 외 여러가지를 팔거나 살 수 있습니다. | 리벤 모드 거래와 경매기능은 예정되어 있습니다.
translation.app.form.too_many_requests: 너무 잦은 로그인\가입 시도입니다. 1분 후에 다시 시도해주세요.
translation.app.errors.not_verified: 인증되지 않은 계정이기 때문에 인증이 필요합니다.
translation.app.errors.last_service: 마지막으로 요청하신 부분을 (기술적인 문제 때문에) 처리할 수 없습니다.
translation.app.errors.banned: 계정이 정지되었습니다 (자신으 프로필 페이지에서 이유를 확인할 수 있습니다)
translation.app.post_order.limit_exceeded: Patron은 한 번에 100개 이상의 거래를 등록할 수 있습니다.
translation.app.post_order.more_than_5_of_the_same_i: 같은 상품을 5개 이상 생성할 수 없습니다.
translation.app.post_order.item_not_tradable: Item is not tradable now (reload the site)
translation.app.edit_order.already_existing_no_dupli: 이미 생성된 기존의 거래와 같이 새로 생성이 불가합니다.

translation.app.auctions.tips.auctionType.buyout: - 경매는 즉시 구매 가격을 포함하고 있습니다.
translation.app.auctions.tips.auctionType.sellOrder: - 경매가 아닌 판매만을 위한 것이며 입찰 제안도 지원하지 않습니다. {br}경매 탭 아래에 판매 건들이 위치해 있습니다. 경매와 판매의 유연성을 위함입니다.
translation.app.auctions.alert.reminder: {reminderLink} 기능을 활성화 하여 자신의 경매에 대한 알림을 받을 수 있도록 권장합니다.

translation.app.auctions.search.riven.title.attribut: 리벤 모드 속성: {attributeName} - 거래 {platform, select, pc {} xbox {| Xbox } ps4 {| Ps4 } switch {| Switch } other {}}| Warframe Market
translation.app.auctions.search.riven.meta.descripti: 우리 경매 플랫폼에서 {itemName}의 리벤 모드를 구매하거나 판매하기 | 얼마 정도가 들까요? -> 최저가: {minPrice} 플래티넘 ⬌ 최고가: {maxPrice} 플래티넘 | 활성화된 경매: {auctionsCount}
우리 경매 플랫폼에서 {itemName}의 리벤 모드를 구매하거나 판매하세요. 이 리벤을 처음으로 목록에 올리고 최고의 가격을 얻으세요.
{attributeName} 속성을 가지고 있는 리벤 모드를 사고 팔거나, 손쉽게 우리 플랫폼을 통해서 거래하세요.

translation.app.auction.item.label: 아이템 사양
translation.app.auction.owner.label: 소유자
translation.app.auction.sorting.label: 분류
translation.app.auction.wasRemoved: 경매 주최자에 의해 경매가 삭제되었다면 이는 더 이상 참가할 수 없는 경매임을 의미하며, 그 경매는 영영히 우리의 기억 속에서 사라집니다.
translation.app.auction.reputationIsTooLow: 이 경매에서 요하는 평판 수치보다 낮아 참가할 수 없습니다.
translation.app.auction.active: 경매는 활성화되어 있으며, 언제든지 낙찰시킬 사용자를 선택할 수 있습니다. {br}또한 낙찰승자와 거래를 하기 위해 잠시 경매가 중단될 수 있으며, {br}기존 낙찰시킬 사용자를 취소하여 다른 낙찰자로 재고할 수 있습니다.
translation.app.auction.onPause.owner: 경매 낙찰자와 게임 내에서 연락을 취하여 최종적인 거래를 성사시키길 바랍니다. 만약 거래가 잘 마무리 되었다면 경매 완료로 표시하기 위해 오른쪽 상단에 "completed"버튼을 눌러주세요.
translation.app.auction.onPause.participant: 경매가 계속되고 있는 경우 마음을 비우지 마세요. 혹시라도 경매 주최자가 기존 낙찰자를 취소하고 다시 다른 낙찰자를 재고해볼 수 있답니다.
translation.app.ws.auctions.errors.reputation_is_to_: 이 경매에 참가하기 위한 최소 평판이 부족합니다.
translation.app.ws.auctions.errors.cant_remove_bid_f: 경매가 종료된 상태이므로, 자신의 입찰가를 삭제할 수 없습니다.
translation.app.ws.auctions.errors.cant_set_bid_in_c: 종료된 경매에서는 자신의 입찰가를 삭제할 수 없습니다.
translation.app.auctions.errors.auctions_limit_excee: 후원자는 한 번에 50개 이상의 경매를 생성할 수 있습니다.
translation.app.auctions.errors.bids_limit_exceeded: 후원자만 50개 이상의 경매를 한 번에 생성할 수 있습니다.
translation.app.auctions.errors.buyout_lower_than_st: 즉시 구매 가격은 시작가보다 낮을 수 없습니다
translation.app.auctions.errors.cant_convert_to_orde: 입찰자가 있기 떄문에 이 경매를 주문으로 변화할 수 없습니다
translation.app.auctions.errors.top_bid_is_greater_t: 최고 입찰가가 정의된 즉시 구매 가격보다 높습니다
translation.app.auctions.errors.starting_higher_than: 시작가는 현존하는 경매가의 최소 가격보다 높을 수 없습니다

translation.app.tools.ducanator.meta.description: 모든 아이템들의 최적의 두캇/플래티넘 비율을 찾고, 최고의 제안을 찾아서 최고의 아이템을 구매하세요. 두캇 시세는 시간과 일간 데이터를 제공합니다.
translation.app.tools.ducanator.faq.source: 데이터는 이 사이트에서만 수집하고 있으며, 다른 소스에서는 수집하지 않습니다.
translation.app.tools.ducanator.faq.sourceCondition: 모든 데이터는 온라인 유저들의 실제 거래 목록을 기반으로 하고 있습니다.
translation.app.tools.ducanator.faq.collection: 데이터는 시간 또는 하루 간격으로 수집하고 있습니다.

translation.app.settings.title: 설정
translation.app.settings.verification.footNote: 이 필드에서 코드를 복사 할 수 있습니다⮝
translation.app.settings.verification.title: 설정 | 인증
translation.app.settings.verification.howTo.3: 봇(WarMarketMan)에게 메시지를 직접 작성하거나, 다음 링크를 이용해서 바로 보낼 수도 있습니다: {link}
translation.app.settings.verification.howTo.7: 문제가 없다면, 봇이 메시지를 읽고 틀린 부분이 없는지 확인한 다음 계정을 인증합니다.
translation.app.settings.verification.howTo.hint: 계정의 이름은 포럼의 이름과 동일합니다.{br} {notificationLink}을 활성화하면 인증 과정 완료를 알림으로 받을 수 있습니다.
translation.app.settings.subscription.title: 설정 | 후원
translation.app.settings.subscription.subscriptionGe: 후원자 배지와 각종 혜택을 받을 수 있습니다.{br}그러기 위해서는 먼저 {patreon} 계정과 {market} 계정을 연동해야 합니다.
translation.app.settings.subscription.successfullyLi: Patreon 계정이 성공적으로 {market} 계정과 연동되었습니다.{br}매 시간마다 계정을 동기화하고 있으니
translation.app.settings.subscription.permanentBonus: 총 금액별로, 각기 다른 혜택을 제공
translation.app.settings.subscription.faq.1.header: 어떻게 하면 Patron이 될 수 있나요?
translation.app.settings.subscription.faq.1.body: Patreon에 가입하신 다음 4가지 후원 옵션 중에서 하나를 고르셔야 합니다.
translation.app.settings.subscription.faq.2.body: 영구 혜택은 말 그대로 영구적으로 지속되는 혜택을 말합니다. 단 한번이라도 혜택을 받았다면, 나중에 후원을 중단해도 주어진 특권은 취소되지 않습니다.
translation.app.settings.subscription.faq.3.body: 아니요, 평판 보너스는 누적되지 않으며, 가장 높은 평판 보너스만이 계정에 적용됩니다.
translation.app.settings.subscription.faq.4.body: 장기간 저희를 지원해주신 분들을 위한 것입니다. 예를 들어, 저희에게 누적해서 120$를 후원하셨을 때, 저희는 그 관대함에 보답할 방법을 찾아야만 했습니다. {br}이것이 다이아몬드 레벨이 존재하는 이유이며, 120$를 후원하신다면 4레벨 다이아몬드 배지를 받으실 수 있습니다. (120/30){br}또한, 특수 레벨 진행바가 표시되며, 만약 적게 내고 싶다면, 10$부터 시작해봅시다.

translation.app.settings.notifications.desktop.notSu: 해당 브라우저는 데스크톱 알림을 지원하지 않습니다.
translation.app.settings.notifications.push.descript: 푸시 알림을 활성화합니다.{br}활성화할 경우 WFM에서 메시지를 보내며, WFM 탭을 닫아도 작동합니다. 브라우저를 닫으면 거래를 할 수 없겠지만, 어쨌든간에요.
translation.app.settings.notifications.push.notSuppo: 해당 브라우저는 푸시 알림을 지원하지 않습니다.

translation.app.lookingFor.title: 구인 | Warframe Market
translation.app.tos.title: Terms of Service | Warframe Market
“Online in game” indicates you are in-game and ready to trade.{br}You have up to 15 minutes to reply when contacted by a trader.

“Online” means you might not be in-game or readily available to trade, but you are able to respond to website messages. If you receive a website message for a listing that currently has the best price, you should respond within 1 hour. Multiple reports regarding no responses to messages within this time may lead to an account suspension.
“Invisible” means you are unable to respond to messages (such as being in a long mission), out of daily trades, or otherwise unavailable.
The warframe.market moderation team may change your activity status irrespective of your current activity status.

If you do not reply within the stated time frame (depends on status, see above), you can be suspended for 1-30 days, based on player reports or in case the warframe.market moderation team believes your listing is not genuine. This can lead to a permanent suspension in case of frequent infractions.{br}You can contact support on the warframe.market {discordLink} server for more details.
The warframe.market website does not automatically change activity status on the website, based on your game state or logging in / out of warframe.
translation.app.tos.trading.listings.logIn: If you don’t log into warframe.market within 7 days, your listings are automatically deactivated.{br}Your listings will remain safe in your account, where you can activate them again by turning them “visible”.
translation.app.tos.trading.listings.listingQuantiti: You are able to create up to 3 visible listings of the same item at different prices.{br}Listing Quantities
For wts (want to sell) listings, the quantity only indicates how many you are willing to sell. You cannot refuse to sell any amount at or lower than your listed quantity.

For wtb (want to buy) listings, the quantity indicates that you would prefer to buy up to the amount specified. You cannot refuse to buy any amount at or lower than your listed quantity.{br}Refer to the trading process for more details.
translation.app.tos.trading.contracts.duplicates: Duplicate auctions for the same item are not allowed.
translation.app.tos.trading.listings.trade: You must be the person doing the trade. Creating listings for items that you do not have is not allowed.
translation.app.tos.account.limitations.limitOrders: There is a limit of 100 orders for free accounts, which can be extended by becoming a Patreon user. More details on {supportUs}.
translation.app.tos.trading.process.priceChanges.cop: Do not change the standard copy-paste message from warframe.market. If you are interested in bartering with the other person, do so in a second message.
translation.app.tos.trading.process.changingPrice: Changing prices or items during the full process, without informing the other party, is not allowed
translation.app.tos.trading.listings.refusing: Refusing your own offers is not allowed.
translation.app.tos.trading.process.ignoring: Ignoring or refusing to communicate with either party without explanation may lead to an account suspension.
translation.app.tos.trading.contracts.fakeBids: Making fake bids on auctions is not allowed and will lead to a permanent account suspension.
translation.app.tos.trading.contracts.auctionMade: You cannot use the auction process to start bidding wars, or to bait the seller of the item.
translation.app.tos.trading.contracts.valid: Auction offers stay valid for 7 days, after which you have to renew your bid. You are allowed to refuse bids you have made that are older than 7 days.
translation.app.tos.trading.reporting.fakeListings: In case of fake listings or inappropriate actions on warframe.market:
translation.app.tos.trading.reporting.fakeListings.t: You can report the user using the reputation tool on the website.
translation.app.tos.trading.reporting.fakeListings.d: You can contact a warframe.market moderator on the {discordLink} server. Please have complete chat screenshots with timestamps visible (which can be activated in the in game settings).
When reporting auctions, please include direct links to all targeted auctions.
translation.app.tos.trading.reporting.fakeListings.i: Fake listings include, but aren’t limited to, listings marked “online in game” but offline in game, afk listings, or “just sold” but not removed from warframe.market (can take up to 5 mins to update on the site).{br}Inappropriate actions include, but aren’t limited to, uncivil behavior and harassment via warframe.market inbox messages.
translation.app.tos.trading.noteText: We will not receive reports submitted using the in-game reporting system because we have no affiliation with Digital Extremes (as mentioned on the site disclaimer as well).
translation.app.tos.trading.behavior.calling: Calling the other user names is not allowed. Rude behavior is not allowed. Do not escalate, instigate or goad the other party into an argument.{br}In any such case, refer to the reporting section for how to report the other user.
translation.app.tos.trading.statistics.fakeOrders: Attempts to deceive the statistics page data by closing fake orders (aka “sold” Akbronco Prime for 10k platinum) will lead to a permanent account suspension.
translation.app.tos.trading.requirements.contacting: Before contacting someone for a listed item, please check the trading requirements of the item + your own trading eligibility. You have to be:
translation.app.tos.trading.requirements.mr2: MR2 or higher and have Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) activated on {warframeLink},
translation.app.tos.trading.requirements.2fa: the appropriate Mastery Rank for the item, have enough trading tax for the item, and have enough tradable Platinum.
translation.app.tos.trading.requirements.masteryRank: Note that starting / gifted / coupon Platinum is not tradable.
translation.app.tos.account.avatarsAndBack.notAllowe: Obscene or indecent avatars and backgrounds are not allowed.
translation.app.tos.account.userName.notExist: Using a username that does not exist in the game is not allowed. The /profile chat command can be used to determine if a username exists or if the user has ever logged in.{br}If you have changed your in-game name, you must reverify yourself on warframe.market. Contact a warframe.market Moderator on {discordLink} or via the {contactUs} page in case you are having problems with this. {br}If your forum name has not updated after a name change, and you have tried logging out of the forums and logging in again, please contact DE’s support: {deSupport}.
translation.app.tos.api.dataUsage.scrapingData: Scraping data and using our API is allowed at a reasonable scale. {br}The limit is 3 requests per second.{br}We reserve the right to block access for any app/service that attempts to use our data.
translation.app.tos.api.note.moreInfo: For more information, join other third-party developers on our {discordLink} server.
translation.app.tos.pwaMobileApp.pwa: PWA refers to Progressive Web Application, which is a mobile friendly way to access all the features of the website.{br}PWA is enabled for warframe.market. You can check pinned messages in our #android-ios-apps channel in the warframe.market {discordLink} server on how to add warframe.market PWA access to your phone.{br}This will give you access to your notifications (Android devices only), all your listings and speedy access to the market on your mobile screen.
translation.app.tos.pwaMobileApp.mobile: There is no official mobile app for warframe.market. Any payments made to any third-party application or ads shown on any app are not connected with warframe.market. The warframe.market moderation team does not provide support for any third-party apps.
translation.app.faq.title: 자주 묻는 질문 | 워프레임 마켓
translation.app.faq.de_disclaimer: Digital Extremes와 협력 관계에 있는 사이트인가요?
translation.app.faq.de_disclaimer.description: 아닙니다. 이 사이트는 42bytes (인디 개발자)가 만들었습니다.{br}저희는 Digital Extremes와 연관되어 있지 않으며, 단지 거래를 쉽게 할 수 있도록 하기 위해 이 사이트를 만들었습니다.{br}이 사이트와 관계된 건은 DE 지원 팀으로 문의하시면 안됩니다. 질문이나 문제가 있다면 저희에게 메일로 연락주세요.
translation.app.faq.how_to.description.1: 거래를 확인하려면 홈에 있는 검색 기능을 통해 구매자/판매자와 연락하면 됩니다.
translation.app.faq.how_to.description.2: 거래를 만들기 위해서는 반드시 가입해야 합니다. 계정은 두가지 방법으로 만들 수 있습니다:
translation.app.faq.how_to.description.3: 가입 및 실제 계정과의 인증이 완료되면, 거래를 생성할 수 있습니다.
translation.app.faq.how_to.description.4.warn: 온라인(게임) 상태로 수정하는 것을 잊지 마세요 - 우측 상단(메뉴)에 있는 기능을 사용하세요
translation.app.faq.how_to.description.5: 다른 사용자들은 당신의 온라인 상태를 확인할 수 있으며, 온라인일 경우 다른 사용자들이 게임 내 귓속말 기능을 이용해 당신에게 메시지를 보낼 수도 있습니다.
translation.app.faq.verification_why: 왜 제 게임 계정을 인증해야 하나요?
translation.app.faq.verification_why.description: 사이트 내에서 허위 계정과 허위 거래를 방지하기 위해서입니다.{br}아마 모두에게 상당히 귀찮은 작업일겁니다.{br}저희는 거래하기 위해 몇 분의 시간을 투자해야 한다는 것에 대해 죄송스럽게 생각하지만, 반드시 필요한 절차입니다.
translation.app.faq.mail_usage.description: 현재로서는 로그인 시에만 사용합니다.{br}저희에게서 다른 메시지를 받지 않을 것입니다. 만약 우리가 일종의 이메일 알림 기능을 제공하게 된다면, 여러분께 미리 이를 알려드릴 것이며 새로운 기능을 활성화/비활성화 할 수 있는 옵션을 제공해드릴 것입니다.
translation.app.faq.info_we_know.description: 자체 가입 시스템을 통해 가입한다면 이메일을 요구합니다.{br}허위 이메일 계정을 사용하시든 선택은 자유이며, 이메일 주소의 활용 용도는 별도의 설명을 참고해주세요.{br}Steam 계정을 통해서 로그인을 하신다면 Steam 이름과 Steam ID를 요구합니다.
translation.app.faq.password_storage.description: 비밀번호는 DB에 평문으로 보관되지 않습니다.{br}먼저, ({link} 기반) 해시 처리에 솔트 처리를 합니다.{br}그러므로 – 저희도 포함해서 – 아무도 볼 수 없으니, 걱정하지 않으셔도 됩니다.
translation.app.faq.change_my_name: 게임 내에서 아이디를 변경했는데, 사이트에서 어떻게 변경하나요?
translation.app.faq.change_my_name.description: 계정을 재인증할 수 있으며, 포럼의 닉네임을 사용합니다.{br}포럼에서 이전 닉네임을 계속 표시한다면, 다시 로그인을 시도해보세요.{br}변경되지 않는다면 저희에게 이전 닉네임 및 새 닉네임을 포함해서 메일을 보내주세요.
translation.app.faq.enable_notifications.description: 알림 기능을 키고 싶은데 브라우저가 알림 기능을 차단하고 있다면 그 기능을 손쉽게 활성화시킬 수 있습니다.
translation.app.faq.enable_notifications.chrome.desc: 1. 브라우저의 왼쪽 상단 모서리에서 주소 바로 앞에 있는 자물쇠 아이콘 클릭{infoIcon}{br}2. '사이트 설정'을 클릭{br}2. 알림을 `허용`으로 변경
translation.app.faq.enable_notifications.firefox.des: 1. 브라우저의 왼쪽 상단 모서리에서 주소 바로 앞에 있는 자물쇠 아이콘을 클릭{infoIcon}{br}2. 안전한 연결 오른쪽에 있는 화살표 `연결 정보 보기` 클릭{br}3. 하단 '더 보기' 클릭{br}4. '이용 권한' 클릭{br}5. 알림 보내기에서 '기본 설정 사용' 해제 후 `허용`으로 변경
translation.app.privacy.title: 개인정보처리방침 | Warframe Market
translation.app.privacy.accessInfo.content: You have the right to request that the company disclose certain information to you about our collection and use of your personal information over the past 12 months. Once we receive and confirm your verifiable consumer request (as described in the section “Exercising Access, Data Portability, and Deletion Rights”), we will disclose to you:
translation.app.privacy.accessInfo.disclose.ourPurpo: Our business or commercial purpose for collecting or selling that personal information.
translation.app.privacy.accessInfo.disclose.personal: The categories of personal information we collected about you.
translation.app.privacy.accessInfo.disclose.piecesIn: The specific pieces of personal information we collected about you (also called data portability request)
translation.app.privacy.accessInfo.disclose.soldInfo: Disclosures for a business purpose, identifying the personal information categories that each category of recipient obtained
Sales, identifying the personal information categories that each category of recipient purchased
If we sold or disclose your personal information for a business purpose, two separate lists disclosing:
translation.app.privacy.accessInfo.disclose.sources: The categories of sources for the personal information we collected about you.
translation.app.privacy.accessInfo.disclose.thirdPar: The categories of third parties with whom we share that personal information.
translation.app.privacy.accessInfo.title: Access to Specific Information and Data Portability Rights
translation.app.privacy.collectAndUse.advertising: We may use third-party advertising companies to serve ads when you visit the Site. These companies may use aggregated information (not including your name, address, email address or telephone number) about your visits to this and other Web sites in order to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you. If you would like more information about this practice and to know your choices about not having this information used by these companies,
translation.app.privacy.collectAndUse.title: Information Collection And Use
translation.app.privacy.collectAndUse.usingSite: While using our Site, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to your name (“Personal Information“).
translation.app.privacy.contactUs.questings: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
translation.app.privacy.contactUs.title: Contact Us
translation.app.privacy.cookies.title: Cookies
translation.app.privacy.cookies.disable: You can choose to disable or selectively turn off our cookies or third-party cookies in your browser settings, or by managing preferences in programs such as Norton Internet Security. However, this can greatly affect how you are able to interact with the Site as well as most other websites.
translation.app.privacy.cookies.storeInfo: We use cookies to store information for your convenience (“Settings“). We also may use third party advertisements on the Site. Some of these advertisers may use technology such as cookies and web beacons when they advertise on the Site, which will also send these advertisers (such as Google through the Google AdSense program) information including your IP address, your ISP , the browser you used to visit our site, and in some cases, whether you have Flash installed. This is generally used for geotargeting purposes (showing New York real estate ads to someone in New York, for example) or showing certain ads based on specific sites visited (such as showing cooking ads to someone who frequents cooking sites).
translation.app.privacy.dataPortability.exercise: To exercise the access, data portability, and deletion rights described above, please submit a verifiable consumer request to us by emailing us at
translation.app.privacy.dataPortability.registered: Only you, or a person registered with the California Secretary of State that you authorize to act on your behalf, may make a verifiable consumer request related to your personal information. You may also make a verifiable consumer request on behalf of your minor child.
translation.app.privacy.dataPortability.respond: We cannot respond to your request or provide you with personal information if we cannot verify your identity or authority to make the request and confirm the personal information relates to you.
translation.app.privacy.dataPortability.title: Exercising Access, Data Portability, and Deletion Rights
translation.app.privacy.dataPortability.verifiableCo: You may only make a verifiable consumer request for access of data portability twice within a 12-month period. The verifiable consumer request must:
Describe your request with sufficient detail that allows us to properly understand, evaluate, and respond to it.
Provide sufficient information that allows us to reasonably verify you are the person about whom we collected personal information or an authorized representative.
translation.app.privacy.dataPortability.verifiableRe: Making a verifiable consumer request does not require you to create an account with us. We will only use personal information provided in a verifiable consumer request to verify the requestor’s identity or authority to make the request.
translation.app.privacy.disclores.soldCategorie.reco: [Category B: California Customer Records personal information categories.]
translation.app.privacy.disclores.soldCategories: In the preceding twelve (12) months, the Company has disclosed the following categories of personal information for a businesspurpose:
translation.app.privacy.disclores.soldCategories.inf: [Category K: Inferences drawn from other personal information.]
translation.app.privacy.disclores.soldCategories.int: [Category F: Internet or other similar network activity.]
translation.app.privacy.disclores.title: Disclosures of Personal Information for a Business Purpose
translation.app.privacy.infoCollect.inferences: J. Inferences drawn from other personal information.
translation.app.privacy.infoCollect.network: F. Internet or other similar network activity.
translation.app.privacy.infoCollect.personalInfo: B. Personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute (Cal. Civ. Code § 1798.80(e))
translation.app.privacy.infoCollect.protected: C. Protected classification characteristics under California or federal law
translation.app.privacy.infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
translation.app.privacy.infoCollect.website: Our websites, emails (with your consent, where required by law), and other products, services and platforms collect information that identifies, relates to, describes, references, is capable of being associated with, or could reasonably be linked, directly or indirectly, with a particular consumer or device (“personal information”). In particular, our websites, apps, emails, and other products, services and platforms may have collected the following categories of personal information from its consumers within the last twelve (12) months:
translation.app.privacy.lastUpdate.42bytes: 42bytes (“us“, “we“, or “our“) operates warframe.market (the “Site“). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of Personal Information we receive from users of the Site.
translation.app.privacy.lastUpdate.title: Last updated: February 1st, 2020
translation.app.privacy.lastUpdate.yourInfo: We use your Personal Information only for providing and improving the Site. By using the Site, you agree to the collection anduse of information in accordance with this policy.
translation.app.privacy.logData.browserInfo: Like many site operators, we collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Site (“Log Data“).
translation.app.privacy.logData.info: This Log Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol (“IP“) address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our Site that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages and other statistics.
translation.app.privacy.logData.services: In addition, we use third party services such as Google Analytics that collect, monitor and analyze this.
translation.app.privacy.logData.title: Log Data
translation.app.privacy.nonDiscrimination.permitted: Any CCPA-permitted financial incentive we offer will reasonably relate to your value and contain written terms that describe the program’s material aspects.
translation.app.privacy.nonDiscrimination.rights: We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your CCPA rights. Unless permitted by the CCPA, we will not:
translation.app.privacy.nonDiscrimination.rights.cha: Charge you different prices or rates for goods or services, including through granting discounts or imposing penalties.
translation.app.privacy.nonDiscrimination.rights.qua: Provide you a different level or quality of goods or services.
translation.app.privacy.nonDiscrimination.rights.sug: Suggest that you may receive a different price or rate for goods or services or a different level of quality of goods or services.
translation.app.privacy.nonDiscrimination.title: Non-Discrimination
translation.app.privacy.notInclude.excluded: Information excluded from the CCPA’s scope, like:
translation.app.privacy.notInclude.excluded.health: health or medical information covered by the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 (HIPAA) and the California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA) or clinical trial data;
translation.app.privacy.notInclude.excluded.personal: personal information covered by certain sector-specific privacy laws, including the Fair Credit Reporting Act(FRCA), the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA) or California Financial Information Privacy Act (FIPA), and the Driver’s Privacy.
translation.app.privacy.notInclude.publicly: Publicly available information from government records.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.additional: The Company will not collect additional categories of personal information or use the personal information we collected formaterially different, unrelated, or incompatible purposes without providing you notice.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore: We may use or disclose the personal information we collect for one or more of the following business purposes:
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.accoun: To create, maintain, customize, and secure your account with us.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.enforc: To respond to law enforcement requests and as required by applicable law, court order, or governmental regulations.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.forth: As described to you when collecting your personal information or as otherwise set forth in the CCPA.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.inquir: To provide you with support and to respond to your inquiries, including investigating and addressing your concerns and monitoring and improving our responses.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.merger: To evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of the Company’s assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which personal information held by the Company about our Website users is among the assets transferred.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.person: To personalize your website, apps, emails, or other product, service or platform experience and to deliver content and product and service offerings relevant to your interests, including targeted offers and ads through our websites, apps, emails, and other products, services and platforms.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.proces: To process your requests, purchases, transactions, and payments and prevent transactional fraud.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.reason: To fulfill or meet the reason you provided the information. For example, if you share your name and contact information to request a newsletter or ask a question about our products or services, we will use that personal information to respond to your inquiry. If you provide your personal information to purchase a product or service, we or our third-party service providers will use that information to process your payment and facilitate delivery. We may also save your information to facilitate new product or service orders and requests.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.securi: To help maintain the safety, security, and integrity of our websites, apps, emails, and other products, services and platforms, databases and other technology assets, and business.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.suppor: To provide, support, personalize, and develop our websites, emails, and other products, services and platforms.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.disclore.testin: For testing, research, analysis, and product development, including to develop and improve our websites, apps, emails, and other products, services and platforms.
translation.app.privacy.personalInfo.title: Use of Personal Information
translation.app.privacy.policyChanges.title: Changes To This Privacy Policy
translation.app.privacy.policyChanges.update: We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time and you should check this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the Service after we post any modifications to the Privacy Policy on this page will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Privacy Policy.
translation.app.privacy.residents.content: This Privacy Notice for California Residents supplements the information contained elsewhere in this Privacy Notice and applies solely to all visitors, users, and others who reside in the State of California (“consumers” or “you”). We adopt this notice to comply with the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (CCPA) and any terms defined in the CCPA have the same meaning when used
translation.app.privacy.residents.title: For California Residents: CCPA Information
translation.app.privacy.rights.content: The CCPA provides consumers located in the state of California with certain rights regarding their personal information and data. The following section describes those rights and explains how to exercise them:
translation.app.privacy.rights.title: Rights and Choices
translation.app.privacy.salesInfo.advertising: The company and our advertising partners collect the personal information identified above (such as the cookies stored on your browser, the advertising identifier on your mobile device, or the IP address of your device) when you visit our websites, apps, and other products, services and platforms, or open our emails. We, and our partners, use this information to tailor and deliver ads to you on our websites, apps, emails, and other products, services and platforms, or to help tailor ads to you when you visit others’ sites (or use others’ apps). To tailor ads that may be more relevant to you, we and/or our partners may share the information we collect with third parties.
translation.app.privacy.salesInfo.services: In the preceding twelve (12) months, the company has sold the following categories of personal information collected through our ad-supported services:
translation.app.privacy.salesInfo.soldCategories.inf: [Category K: Inferences drawn from other personal information.]
translation.app.privacy.salesInfo.soldCategories.int: [Category F: Internet or other similar network activity.]
translation.app.privacy.salesInfo.title: Sales of Personal Information
translation.app.privacy.security.secure: The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
translation.app.privacy.security.title: Security
translation.app.privacy.sharingInfo.businessPurpose: The Company may disclose your personal information to a third-party for a business purpose or sell your personal information,subject to your right to opt-out of those sales (see ‘Sales of Personal Information’ below). When we disclose personalinformation for a business purpose, we enter a contract that describes the purpose and requires the recipient to both keep thatpersonal information confidential and not use it for any purpose except performing the contract. The CCPA prohibits thirdparties who purchase the personal information we hold from reselling it unless you have received explicit notice and anopportunity to opt-out of further sales (see ‘Sales of Personal Information’ below).
translation.app.privacy.sharingInfo.nextCategories: We may share your personal information with the following categories of third parties:
translation.app.privacy.sharingInfo.nextCategories.t: Third parties with whom we partner to offer products and services to you.
translation.app.privacy.sharingInfo.title: Sharing Personal Information
translation.app.apiDocs.title: API 문서 | Warframe Market
translation.app.order.platinum: 개당 {platCount, plural, one {# 플래티넘} other {# 플래티넘}}
translation.app.order.clipboard.template.en: /w {ingameName} Hi! I want to {action}: {itemName} {modRank, select, null {} other {(rank {modRank}) }}for {price} platinum. (warframe.market)
translation.app.order.clipboard.template.ru: /w {ingameName} Привет! я хочу {action}: {itemName} {modRank, select, null {} other {(ранг {modRank}) }}за {price} платины. (warframe.market)
translation.app.order.clipboard.template.fr: /w {ingameName} Salut!je voudrais {action}: {itemName} {modRank, select, null {} other {(rank {modRank}) }}pour {price} platine. (warframe.market)
translation.app.order.clipboard.template.sv: /w {ingameName} Tjenare! Jag skulle vilja {action}: {itemName} {modRank, select, null {} other {(rank {modRank}) }}för {price} platinum. (warframe.market)
translation.app.order.clipboard.template.de: /w {ingameName} Hallo, ich möchte folgendes {action}: {itemName} {modRank, select, null {} other {(rank {modRank}) }}für {price} Platin. (warframe.market)
translation.app.order.clipboard.template.zh: /w {ingameName} Hi! I want to {action}: {itemName} {modRank, select, null {} other {(rank {modRank}) }}for {price} platinum. (warframe.market)
translation.app.order.clipboard.template.pl: /w {ingameName} Hej! Chce {action}: {itemName} {modRank, select, null {} other {(rank {modRank}) }}za {price} platyny. (warframe.market)
